net.fathomsoft.nova.error

Class Message

  • java.lang.Object
    • net.fathomsoft.nova.error.Message

  • public class Message
extends java.lang.Object
    Class that holds the information for a message that will be output from the compiler.
    Since:
    v0.1 Jan 5, 2014 at 9:28:08 PM
    Version:
    v0.2.14 Jul 19, 2014 at 7:33:13 PM
    Author:
    Braden Steffaniak

        Create a new message instance with the given message.

        Create a new message instance with the given message that is representing the given node.

        node - The node that the message is talking about.
